revised_title: The Rhythmic Motion of the Heart: A Croonian Lecture
tldr: In this Croonian Lecture, James Paget discusses the cause of the heart's rhythmic motion. He explains that the rhythmic action is not dependent on the heart's nervous centers or the blood flowing through its cavities. Instead, it is something within the heart itself. Paget also describes various experiments that demonstrate the source of the rhythmic action and how it is not solely due to the properties of the muscular tissue.
